body.p: A Kentucky attorney. Educated at the Hopkins Seminary and Bethel College. Read law under Ambrose G. Gordon (father), Lysander Gordon (brother), and Polk Lafoon. Member of the Republican Party. Admitted to the bar in 1859. Lived in Hopkins County, Kentucky in 1860. Married to Cordelia Adeline Arnold Gordon. Father of Ora G. Gordon and William L. Gordon, Jr.
